venue.name: Wanda Metropolitano
venue.address: Av. de Luis Aragonés, 4, 28022 Madrid, Spain

Presidential Box.Description: Exclusive seating area offering the best view and luxury experience at Wanda Metropolitano.
Presidential Box.View_Quality: Central view from the most privileged vantage point, unparalleled immersion.
Presidential Box.Unique_Features: Luxury seating, utmost level of privacy and exclusivity.
Presidential Box.Accessibility: VIP access with personal assistance, premier access routes.
Presidential Box.Special_Perks: Exquisite dining options, opportunities for meet-and-greet with players.

VIP Seats.Description: Premium seats with excellent pitch views and exclusive benefits, providing a top-notch football experience.
VIP Seats.View_Quality: Prime side views, very close to the pitch action.
VIP Seats.Unique_Features: Superior comfort seating, complimentary gourmet snacks and drinks.
VIP Seats.Special_Perks: Access to VIP lounges, special events invitations.

Grandstand.Description: Elevated side views for an optimal viewing experience, perfect for fans who want a great view without breaking the bank.
Grandstand.View_Quality: Excellent perspective of the entire pitch, clear line of sight.
Grandstand.Unique_Features: Good balance of view quality and ticket price.
Grandstand.Accessibility: Easy access, available facilities for guests with disabilities.
Grandstand.Special_Perks: A popular choice among regular fans for its great value.

General Admission.Description: Affordable tickets providing access to vibrant atmosphere areas, ideal for the most passionate fans.
General Admission.View_Quality: Dynamic view of the game, engaging fan experience.
General Admission.Unique_Features: Access to the heart of the fan sections, lively atmosphere.
General Admission.Accessibility: Standard access, dedicated areas for wheelchair users.
General Admission.Special_Perks: Part of the passionate fan base, traditional stadium experience.

restaurants_bars.name: Restaurante La Esquina
restaurants_bars.address: Av. de Concha Espina, 1, 28036 Madrid, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: An elegant restaurant inside the Santiago Bernabéu Stadium, offering contemporary Spanish cuisine with views of the pitch.

restaurants_bars.name: Zen Market
restaurants_bars.address: Av. de Concha Espina, 1, 28036 Madrid, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: A chic Asian fusion restaurant located at the Santiago Bernabéu Stadium, known for its sushi and elegant decor.

restaurants_bars.name: Real Café Bernabéu
restaurants_bars.address: Av. de Concha Espina, 1, Puerta 30, 28036 Madrid, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: A café with breathtaking views of the stadium's interior, offering a variety of dishes and a perfect spot for a coffee or meal.

restaurants_bars.name: Asador de la Esquina
restaurants_bars.address: Av. de Concha Espina, 1, 28036 Madrid, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: A renowned grill restaurant at the Bernabéu, specializing in traditional Spanish meats and seasonal dishes.

restaurants_bars.name: El Barril de Bernabéu
restaurants_bars.description: A seafood restaurant known for its fresh fish and seafood tapas, located a short walk from the Santiago Bernabéu Stadium.

restaurants_bars.name: Taberna La Bola
restaurants_bars.address: Calle de La Bola, 5, 28013 Madrid, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: A bit further from the stadium, this historic tavern is famous for its traditional Madrid stew, offering a deep dive into Spanish cuisine.

restaurants_bars.name: Bodega La Ardosa
restaurants_bars.description: A traditional Spanish tavern known for its tortilla de patatas, vermouth on tap, and a wide selection of beers and wines.

restaurants_bars.name: Casa Revuelta
restaurants_bars.description: Famous for its cod tapas, this historic bar offers a variety of traditional dishes in the heart of Madrid.

restaurants_bars.name: Mercado de San Miguel
restaurants_bars.address: Plaza de San Miguel, s/n, 28005 Madrid, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: A gourmet market offering a wide range of high-quality tapas, wines, and fresh products in a beautiful iron and glass structure.

restaurants_bars.name: Sobrino de Botín
restaurants_bars.description: Listed as the oldest restaurant in the world by the Guinness World Records, it's famous for its roasted suckling pig and lamb.

restaurants_bars.name: StreetXo
restaurants_bars.description: A high-energy street food restaurant by renowned chef David Muñoz, offering an eclectic mix of Asian and European cuisines.

restaurants_bars.name: Cervecería Alemana
restaurants_bars.address: Plaza de Santa Ana, 6, 28012 Madrid, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: A historic beer hall that has been serving traditional German and Spanish dishes since 1904, located in the vibrant Plaza de Santa Ana.

accommodations.name: Hotel Paseo del Arte

accommodations.description: Located on Madrid's main avenue, Paseo de la Castellana, near the Santiago Bernabéu Stadium, this hotel offers modern accommodations and excellent service.

accommodations.name: Hotel VP Jardín Metropolitano
accommodations.address: Avenida de la Reina Victoria, 12, 28003 Madrid, Spain
accommodations.description: A comfortable and contemporary hotel with a stunning vertical garden, conveniently located for visiting Real Madrid's stadium and other city attractions.

accommodations.name: B&B Hotel Madrid Getafe
accommodations.description: A modern and affordable hotel located in Getafe, offering comfortable rooms and convenient access to the city center via nearby transport links.

accommodations.name: Ibis Budget Madrid Getafe
accommodations.description: Offering budget-friendly accommodations, this hotel is a great option for travelers looking to explore Madrid and its surroundings without breaking the bank.

accommodations.name: Hotel Exe Getafe
accommodations.description: This hotel provides guests with spacious rooms and a range of amenities, located conveniently close to Getafe's main business and leisure areas.

accommodations.name: Hotel Dinastia Getafe

tourist_attractions.name: The Royal Palace of Madrid
tourist_attractions.address: Calle de Bailén, s/n, 28071 Madrid, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: The official residence of the Spanish Royal Family at the city of Madrid, but it is only used for state ceremonies. It is the largest royal palace in Europe by floor area.

tourist_attractions.name: Prado Museum
tourist_attractions.address: Calle de Ruiz de Alarcón, 23, 28014 Madrid, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: Spain's main national art museum, featuring one of the finest collections of European art, dating from the 12th century to the early 20th century.

tourist_attractions.name: Retiro Park
tourist_attractions.address: Plaza de la Independencia, 7, 28001 Madrid, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: A large and popular green oasis in the heart of Madrid, offering a peaceful retreat with beautiful sculptures, monuments, and a magnificent lake.

tourist_attractions.name: Santiago Bernabéu Stadium
tourist_attractions.address: Av. de Concha Espina, 1, 28036 Madrid, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: The iconic home of Real Madrid C.F., offering tours that include access to the trophy room, pitch side, and the presidential box.

tourist_attractions.name: Gran Vía
tourist_attractions.description: Madrid's bustling main street, known for its grand architecture, shopping, and theaters. A must-visit for first-time travelers to Madrid.

tourist_attractions.name: Thyssen-Bornemisza National Museum
tourist_attractions.description: Part of Madrid's Golden Triangle of Art, this museum houses an extensive collection ranging from the Middle Ages to the late 20th century.

options.description: The Estadio Metropolitano metro station (Line 7) provides direct access to the Wanda Metropolitano, offering convenient connections to Madrid's main attractions.
options.directions: For directions and detailed metro schedules, visit the Metro Madrid website or use their mobile app.

options.description: Several bus lines serve the area around Wanda Metropolitano, including lines E2, 28, 38, and 140, making it easily accessible from throughout the city.
options.directions: Check the EMT Madrid website or mobile app for bus schedules, routes, and real-time updates.

options.description: Parking facilities are available at Wanda Metropolitano for those who prefer to drive to the stadium.
options.directions: Visit the Atlético de Madrid website for more information on parking and how to best access the stadium by car.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity and the best seat selections for Atlético de Madrid games.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster Spain
best_places_to_buy.description: A reliable ticketing partner offering tickets for various events, including Atlético de Madrid games, within Spain.

best_places_to_buy.name: Resale Platforms
best_places_to_buy.description: Check reputable resale platforms for tickets, especially for sold-out games. Ensure the platform offers buyer protection and is authorized to sell Atlético de Madrid tickets.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Look for family packages or group discounts for savings. Mid-week games may offer lower prices compared to weekend games. Sign up for the team's newsletter for promotional deals.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Purchase tickets from official sources or reputable platforms to avoid scams. Be cautious of offers that seem too good to be true, and verify the authenticity of tickets when buying from resale sites.
